text: Margaret Court and Judy Dalton were the defending champions but Margaret Court did not compete this year. Judy Dalton teamed up with Rosemary Casals and successfully defended her title by defeating Gail Chanfreau and Françoise Dürr 6–3, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== ==External links== *1971 US Open – Women's draws and results at the International Tennis Federation Women's Doubles Category:US Open (tennis) by year – Women's Doubles Category:1971 in women's tennis Category:1971 in American women's sports
title: 1971 US Open – Women's Doubles
